iwork.patchpanel
Class Mapping

java.lang.Object
  iwork.patchpanel.Mapping
public class Mapping
extends java.lang.Object

The Mapping is a logical container for a translation mapping specification. A specification consists of a translation criteria and an output event list. The translation criteria is the minimum set of fields and values that an incoming event or translation candidate must have for a translation to occur. The output event list contains the desired translation output. Each output event might contain fields whose values depend on the incomimg event that meets that translation criteria.

Constructor Detail

Mapping

public Mapping()
This is the default constructor for a Mapping. The translationCriteria member is initialized with the default event constructor with default fields removed. The eventList is initialized to an empty array.

Mapping

public Mapping(Mapping other)

Mapping

public Mapping(iwork.eheap2.Tuple eventToMap)
This constructor creates a mapping from an eventToMap. The eventList is initialized to an empty array.

NOTE: the Mapping constructor assumes that no default event fields are intended to be contained in the translationCriteria or and removes them from the eventToMap to create the translationCriteria event. However, default fields are allowed to be a part of the mapping specification. They may be added to the public translationCriteria event using the addField method of the Event class.

Parameters:
eventToMap - an event containing the fields and values desired for a translation criteria specification. See note.

Mapping

public Mapping(iwork.eheap2.Tuple eventToMap,
               iwork.eheap2.Tuple[] outputList)
This constructor creates a mapping from an eventToMap and outputList.

NOTE: the Mapping constructor assumes that no default event fields are intended to be contained in the translationCriteria or outputList and removes them from the eventToMap and outputList to create the translationCriteria event and the eventList array of events, respectively. However, default fields are allowed to be a part of the mapping specification. They may be added to the public translationCriteria event or the public eventList array of events using the addField method of the Event class.

Parameters:
eventToMap - an event containing the fields and values desired for a translation criteria specification. See note.
outputList - an array of output events intended to be the result of a translation.

Mapping

public Mapping(java.lang.String mappingString)
This constructor creates a mapping from a mappingString which may be obtained from the Intermediary process or the toString method of this class

Parameters:
mappingString - a string representing the translation mapping specification

removeDefaultFields

public static iwork.eheap2.Tuple removeDefaultFields(iwork.eheap2.Tuple tuple)
This function is intended to aid in converting an event to a translation criteria for an event mapping. The translation criteria is an event that contains only the fields necessary for specifying the minimum condition for translation. If a translation candidate does not exactly meet all of the fields specified in the translation criteria, it will not be translated.

NOTE: If you desire your translation criteria to contain default fields, you should add them (using event.addField) after a call to this function

Parameters:
tuple - standard eheap2 tuple that contains translation criteria fields
Returns:
a translation criteria based on the input event contains the EventType field as well as any non-default fields present at input.

removeDefaultFields

public static iwork.eheap2.Tuple removeDefaultFields(iwork.eheap2.Tuple tuple,
                                                     boolean preserveChangedDefaults)
This function is intended to aid in converting an event to a translation criteria for an event mapping. The translation criteria is an event that contains only the fields necessary for specifying the minimum condition for translation. If a translation candidate does not exactly meet all of the fields specified in the translation criteria, it will not be translated.

NOTE: If you desire your translation criteria to contain default fields, you should add them (using event.addField) after a call to this function

Parameters:
tuple - standard eheap2 tuple that contains translation criteria fields
preserveChangedDefaults - if this is true, any default fields containing non-default values will be preserved.
Returns:
a translation criteria based on the input event contains the EventType field as well as any non-default fields present at input.
